comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_8) AppleWebKit/535.7 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/16.0.912.63 Safari/535.7

Steps to reproduce:

Entered text in the comment field on http://alt.org/nethack/dudley: "Nice strip!"


Actual results:

It submitted "Nice striPr"


Expected results:

It should have submitted "Nice strip!"
comments.author: beebop.gol@gmail.com

comments.author: bugzilla@mversen.de
comments.text: Unable to test because I can't answer the security questions
comments.creator: bugzilla@mversen.de
comments.raw_text: Unable to test because I can't answer the security questions

I don't see this bug in Firefox 10.0.1, Mac OS X 10.7.2. (There's a list of nethack symbols for the security question here: http://www.nethack.org/v343/Guidebook.html )

beebop.gol, could you submit the user agent of the browser in which you're having the problem? It looks like you pasted the user agent of Google Chrome instead.
comments.author: dave@vasilevsky.ca
